item.title: 德国汽车业称重返苏伊士运河前仍有疑问
item.description: 德国汽车工业协会VDA周五表示，德国汽车行业在恢复经苏伊士运河运输前仍面临诸多悬而未决的问题，尤其是保险问题。【原文：The German automotive industry is still seeing open questions, particularly insurance issues, before resuming transports through the Suez Canal, its business association VDA said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国主导的跨境数字货币平台用户激增
item.description: 最新报告显示，中国主导的新型数字货币平台交易额已飙升至550亿美元以上，这再次表明，建立替代美元主导的全球支付体系的努力正在取得进展。【原文：Transactions on a new China-led digital currency platform have surged to over $55 billion, a new report shows, the latest sign that efforts to build alternatives to dollar-dependent global payment systems are ​gaining traction.】

item.title: 诺沃制药的Wegovy药丸上市首日即追踪到3,071份处方
item.description: 诺和诺德的减肥药Wegovy上市后前四天在美国开出3071张处方，IQVIA数据周五披露的数据显示。投资者正密切关注该公司能否在竞争激烈的减肥药市场中，凭借先发优势压制竞争对手礼来公司。【原文：Novo Nordisk's Wegovy pill hit 3,071 U.S. prescriptions in the first four days after its launch, IQVIA data shared by analysts on Friday showed, as investors closely watch to see if the firm can ram home its first-mover advantage against rival Eli Lilly in a competitive weight-loss market.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称戴安娜航运计划发起Genco代理权争夺战，拟提名6名董事
item.description: 知情人士透露，全球航运公司戴安娜航运计划发起代理权争夺战，以取代竞争对手Genco航运贸易公司现有的六名董事。此前该公司董事会刚于数日前否决了戴安娜的收购要约。【原文：Global shipping company Diana Shipping plans to launch a proxy fight to replace rival Genco Shipping & Trading's six current directors, making its decision just days after the board rejected Diana's takeover offer, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 卢克石油的国际资产与潜在买家
item.description: 美国财政部已将受制裁的俄罗斯石油公司卢克石油就出售其大部分国际资产进行谈判的截止日期延长至2月28日。【原文：The U.S. Treasury has extended the deadline for sanctioned Russian oil firm Lukoil to negotiate the sale of the bulk of its international assets until February 28.】

item.title: 星链竞争对手欧卫通信与欧洲MaiaSpace公司达成协议，将共同发射卫星
item.description: 欧洲卫星运营商欧卫通信周五宣布，已与法国太空初创企业MaiaSpace签署协议，未来将由后者负责其低地球轨道（LEO）卫星的发射任务。此举对欧洲而言具有重大战略意义，助力其追赶美国竞争对手SpaceX。【原文：European satellite operator Eutelsat said on Friday it had signed a deal with French space startup MaiaSpace for the future launches of its low Earth orbit (LEO) satellites, in a major strategic boost for Europe as it seeks to catch up with U.S. rival SpaceX.】

item.title: Netflix财报料将因华纳兄弟交易问题而退居次席
item.description: 网飞计划通过收购华纳兄弟加速营收增长，这一战略将在周二该公司公布第四季度财报时成为焦点。这家流媒体先驱正与派拉蒙争夺好莱坞最受追捧的制片厂之一。【原文：Netflix's plans to accelerate revenue growth by buying Warner Bros will be in focus on Tuesday when it reports fourth-quarter results, as the streaming pioneer battles Paramount for one of the most prized studios in Hollywood.】

item.title: 欧盟与南共市贸易协定风波后续将如何发展？
item.description: 欧盟高层官员将于周六前往巴拉圭，与南美国家联盟南方共同市场签署自由贸易协定。历经25年谈判，这项协定将为欧盟缔结史上最大规模贸易协定铺平道路。【原文：Top EU officials will travel to Paraguay on Saturday to sign a free trade agreement with South American bloc Mercosur, paving the way for the European Union's largest ever trade accord after 25 years of negotiations.】

item.title: 印度塔塔科技季度利润暴跌96%，因一次性劳动法合规费用
item.description: 工程研发公司塔塔科技周四公布，其第三季度利润暴跌96%，主要受印度新劳动法规相关的一次性费用拖累，创下该公司2023年上市以来最大跌幅。【原文：Engineering research and development (ER&D) firm Tata Technologies reported a 96% drop in third-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt primarily by a one-time charge tied to India's new labour codes, their largest such drop since the company's 2023 market debut.】

item.title: 菲茨沃尔特资本将对英国拍卖技术公司的收购要约提高至6.58亿美元
item.description: 投资公司菲茨沃尔特资本于周五将对拍卖技术集团的潜在现金收购报价提高至每股400便士。此前，这家英国在线拍卖运营商的董事会以低估企业价值为由拒绝了之前的收购提案。【原文：Investment firm FitzWalter Capital raised its possible cash offer for Auction Technology Group to 400 pence per share on Friday, after the British online auction operator's board rejected previous proposals as undervaluing the business.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：淹没区域
item.description: 迈克·多兰和ROI团队本周末最期待阅读、观看和收听的内容。【原文：Everything Mike Dolan and the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: PNC金融服务集团利润激增，得益于并购交易带来的意外之财和利息收入的提升
item.description: PNC金融服务集团第四季度利润飙升25%，这家美国银行从利息支付中获得更多收益，并从并购交易的复苏中获利。【原文：PNC Financial's profit jumped 25% in the fourth quarter, as the U.S. bank earned more from interest payments and cashed in on a dealmaking rebound.】

item.title: 华尔街银行第四季度财报：五张图表解读
item.description: 华尔街大型银行以强劲表现结束2025年，高管们对新一年持乐观态度，尽管美国总统唐纳德·特朗普提出的信用卡利率上限提案令整个行业保持警惕。【原文：Wall Street's largest banks ended 2025 on a strong note and executives struck an upbeat tone for the year ahead, even as U.S. President Donald Trump's proposed cap on credit card interest rates ​kept the industry on edge.】

item.title: 华尔街期货上涨，芯片制造商在震荡一周后收高
item.description: 美国股指期货周五上涨，因半导体股延续了人工智能驱动的涨势，结束了震荡交投的一周，同时拉开了第四季度财报季的序幕。【原文：U.S. stock index ​futures rose on Friday as semiconductor shares extended their AI‑fueled rally at the end ‌of a choppy trading week that ushered in the fourth‑quarter earnings season.】

item.title: 美国股票基金创下三个半月来最大单周资金流入
item.description: 截至1月14日当周，美国股票基金资金大幅涌入，投资者对即将到来的第四季度财报季持乐观预期，同时对地缘政治风险及美联储独立性的担忧被暂时抛诸脑后。【原文：U.S. equity funds witnessed sharp inflows in the week to January 14 on upbeat earnings expectations ahead of the ​fourth quarter earnings season, with investors brushing off concerns around geopolitics ‌and the Federal Reserve's independence.】

item.title: M&T银行第四季度利润因利息收入增长而提升
item.description: M&T银行周五公布的第四季度利润实现增长，主要得益于利息收入增加和抵押贷款业务表现强劲。【原文：M&T Bank posted a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Friday, driven by higher interest income and stronger mortgage banking results.】

item.title: 明尼阿波利斯小型企业因移民执法行动遭受重创，而大企业却保持沉默
item.description: 由于担心遭到报复或面临抵制威胁，企业在特朗普总统第二任期内对其政策的态度明显收敛了许多。【原文：Businesses have been much less outspoken about President Donald Trump's policies in his second term, due to fear of retaliation or threats of boycotts.】

item.title: 焦点：部分制药商对FDA快速审查计划的法律风险暗自忧虑
item.description: 六位行业消息人士向路透社透露，尽管有六家以上大型制药商参与了特朗普政府的新药加速审批计划，但其他领先制药企业仍因潜在法律风险而犹豫不决。【原文：More than half a dozen major drugmakers are participating in the Trump administration's speedier review program for new medicines, yet other leading pharmaceutical companies are hesitating over what they see as potential legal risks, six industry sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 在移民与海关执法局突袭行动之际，部分家得宝投资者希望了解执法部门如何使用其监控数据
item.description: 一群家得宝投资者要求该公司重新评估与监控公司Flock Safety的合作关系，并说明其数据如何被使用及与执法部门共享。此前有独立媒体报道称，该供应商的数据已被用于移民与海关执法局的调查。【原文：A group of Home Depot investors is asking the company to review its partnership with surveillance firm Flock Safety and state how its data is used and shared with law enforcement, following reports by an independent media outlet that the vendor's data has been used in Immigration and Customs Enforcement investigations.】

item.title: 扑克脸鲍威尔或藏有王牌以阻挠特朗普对美联储的改组
item.description: 现年72岁的美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔，如今可以陪伴孙辈玩耍，重拾高尔夫球技，还能在吉他上练上几首曲子。【原文：At 72, U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has grandkids to play with, a golf game to get back to and a tune or two to master on the guitar.】

item.title: 焦点：美联航与美国航空争夺芝加哥奥黑尔机场主导权
item.description: 芝加哥奥黑尔国际机场作为美国航空交通的枢纽，如今已成为美联航与美航之间日益激烈的竞争前线。【原文：Chicago O'Hare International Airport, long a crossroads of U.S. air travel, has become the front line in an intensifying contest between United Airlines and American Airlines .】

item.title: 马斯克的星链在伊朗镇压行动中面临高调安全测试
item.description: 伊朗对异议人士的镇压行动，正成为埃隆·马斯克旗下星链卫星互联网面临的最严峻安全考验之一。自乌克兰战争期间部署以来，该卫星网络始终是抵御国家强制实施的互联网封锁的生命线。【原文：Iran’s crackdown on dissidents is shaping up as one of the toughest security tests yet for Elon Musk’s Starlink, which has served as a lifeline against state-imposed internet blackouts since its deployment during the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 消息人士称，英国大臣周四在伦敦会见了派拉蒙首席执行官埃里森。
item.description: 知情人士周五向路透社透露，英国文化大臣丽莎·南迪本周会见了派拉蒙天舞影业首席执行官大卫·埃里森，双方就影响英国影视行业的问题进行了讨论。【原文：British culture minister Lisa Nandy met Paramount SkyDance chief executive David Ellison this week to discuss issues affecting the UK's film and television sector, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 印度Tech Mahindra公司凭借制造业实力超出季度营收预期
item.description: 印度软件服务提供商Tech Mahindra周五公布的第三季度营收超出预期，得益于其通信和制造业板块的增长。【原文：Indian software services provider Tech Mahindra reported bigger-than-expected third-quarter revenue on Friday, aided by growth in its communications and manufacturing segments.】

item.title: 印度威普罗公司第三季度营收超预期，得益于通信业务板块强劲表现
item.description: 威普罗公司周五公布的第三季度营收超出预期，主要得益于其美洲业务部分的增长，该业务涵盖通信、医疗和消费品领域。【原文：Wipro reported better-than-expected third-quarter revenue on Friday, driven by growth in a part of its Americas business, which includes the communications, health and consumer segments.】

item.title: 全球股票基金录得三个半月来最强劲的单周资金流入
item.description: 截至1月14日当周，全球股票基金录得15周来最大单周净买入额。投资者将全球股市推近历史高位，延续了去年的涨势，同时淡化了对全球经济和地缘政治的担忧。【原文：Global equity funds witnessed the largest weekly net purchase in 15 weeks in the week to January 14, as investors pushed world stocks close to record ​highs, extending momentum from last year and brushing aside concerns over the ‌global economy and geopolitics.】

item.title: 尼日利亚向BeetleSat、Satelio和亚马逊的柯伊伯公司颁发卫星许可证
item.description: 尼日利亚电信监管机构周四宣布，已向亚马逊旗下库珀系统公司、以色列NSLComm公司的BeetleSat卫星项目以及德国Satelio物联网服务公司颁发七年期卫星运营许可。这些企业将与马斯克旗下的SpaceX公司共同获得拓展太空宽带服务的资质。【原文：Nigeria has issued seven-year satellite permits to Amazon's Kuiper Systems, Israel's NSLComm's BeetleSat and Germany-based Satelio IoT Services, joining Elon Musk-owned SpaceX among operators cleared to expand space-based broadband, the telecoms regulator said on Thursday.】

item.title: 戴姆勒卡车2025年销量下滑8%，北美需求疲软是主因
item.description: 戴姆勒卡车公司周五报告称，2025年交付量下降8%，受北美需求疲软影响。作为全球最大的卡车制造商之一，该公司表示，北美市场需求疲软是导致交付量下降的主要原因。【原文：Daimler Truck , one of the world's biggest truckmakers, reported a 8% decline in 2025 deliveries on Friday, hit by weaker demand in North America.】

item.title: 英德拉公司签署11亿美元协议，负责管理伦敦交通票务及控制系统
item.description: 西班牙科技集团英德拉公司周五宣布，已赢得伦敦交通局（TfL）授予的合同，将负责运营该市公共交通网络的票务及控制系统，合同价值高达9.75亿欧元（约合11亿美元）。【原文：Spanish technology group Indra has won a contract from Transport for London (TfL) to run the ticketing and control systems across the city's public transit network in a deal worth up to 975 million euros ($1.1 billion), it said on Friday.】

item.title: 现代汽车集团将任命特斯拉人形机器人项目前负责人担任顾问
item.description: 韩国现代汽车集团周五宣布，计划任命特斯拉人形机器人项目前负责人米兰·科瓦奇担任顾问，以提升其在机器人和人工智能领域的竞争力。【原文：South Korea's Hyundai Motor Group said on Friday it plans to appoint Milan Kovac, the former head of Tesla's humanoid robot program, as an adviser as it seeks to bolster its competitiveness in robotics and artificial intelligence.】
